邮箱格式不正确: The mailbox format is not correct.
字母数字或下划线，字母开头: Alphabet, digit or underscore, beginning with an alphabet
两次密码输入不一致: The two password entries are inconsistent.
6-18位密码，包含大小写、特殊符号、数字: A 6-18-digit password, including upper and lower case letters, special symbols and numbers.
团队名称不能为空: The team name cannot be empty.
初始项目不能为空: The initial project cannot be empty.
团队允许您在多个项目之间进行管理与协作。团队的成员拥有访问其中所有项目的权限。: The team allows you to manage and collaborate among multiple projects. The members of the team have the permission to access all the projects therein.
创建团队时，您需要同时在团队下创建一个初始项目。: When creating a team, you need to create an initial project under the team at the same time.
你需要为团队创建一个初始项目: You need to create an initial project for the team.
请联系团队管理员发送邀请到你的邮箱。: Please contact the team administrator to send an invitation to your mailbox.
你需要加入或者创建团队: You need to join or create a team.
你加入或者参与的项目: The project that you join or participate in
你加入或者创建的团队: The team that you joined or created
是否要退出当前账号？: Are you going to log out of the current account?
请输入邮箱或用户名: Please enter the email or username
